title: BA chief opens £3.3m Aerospace Centre extension (University of South Wales)
text: ( Source : University of South Wales ) THE Executive Chairman of British Airways , Keith Williams , is opening a new £3.3m development of the Aerospace Centre at the University of South Wales ( USW ) today=. Keith Williams will be presented with
